snippet.textDisplay:
what I don't understand is; why is hairiness equal with men? I mean there 
are men that shave their armpits and legs too - but too many don't dare to 
because they'll "look gay" (which is a homophobic statement on top of 
that). ﻿
I'm sick of this stuff in adds.﻿
uhh.. fuck this﻿
iam not a feminist but this goes to far ﻿

+Samantha Richardson
Natürlich tue ich das aber ich habe auch meine eigenen Gedanken und 
Vostellungen und will mich nicht irgendeiner Gruppe zugehörig fühlen deren 
Regeln ich entsprechen muss.

+Samantha Richardson
"If you don't subscribe to my heavy-handed ideology of 'what I want is 
correct and everything else is wrong' then you don't believe in equality!"

Oh, you're not a feminist. So you don't believe in the political, economic 
and social equality of the sexes?
Sexist and racist both.﻿
+Inés Franco Varela ( blue pleasures ) I think you need a dictionary.

How the fuck do you get legs that hairy if you just shaved yesterday? Do 
you grow 1 cm every 24 hours?﻿
This is stupid. "Brilliant Ads" my ass.﻿

It's not even dudeness - all human beings grow body hair, it's just 
insulation.
Women not removing leg hair isn't "risking dudeness" it's just choosing to 
not give a fuck about what other people think your body should look like/or 
being to damn busy being boss to have time to remove your body hair.
Women who want to remove body hair should do it and feel happy with their 
bodies, women who don't want to remove body hair should not do it and feel 
happy. No one should judge anyone for what they do with their body hair.

TLDR; Fuck you veet, I'm gonna buy my hair removal products from a company 
that aren't openly into body shaming.﻿

The woman who is full of hair is a savage at the same level as a primitive 
man. Ha ha ha! 
～Weblio translation ～﻿
2-in-1: Asians and hairy ladies be butthurt! :P﻿
HAHAHAHA this is so funny! :)﻿

Its light-hearted humour and it is harmless. If the PC brigade and 
feminists want REAL issues to focus on they should concentrate on FGM or 
the stoning of women!﻿

Sexist and racist both. Who comes up with this rot? Makes me even more 
determined to stop shaving my legs someday.﻿

Sexist sure...but racist? Please explain to me how this is racist? Just 
because she happens to be Asian? No...anyone could have that job. If she 
was a white woman working as a pedicurist NO ONE would say anything. 
However, if she was any other race it's automatically racist. Nowhere is it 
implied that all Asians must work as pedicurists. However, the sexism. Yes, 
very prevalent in this video.
Now thats some sexist piece of crap﻿

+Ichiro Taniguchi Immature? Are you living under a rock? Don't you know 
that young people are constantly pressured by society and media to be a 
certain way? Young girls are so influenced by these things that say that 
the only way to be worth something is to be desirable to men, and to be 
that you have to be pretty and act a certain way and be a certain way. 
Consequences of this? Anorexia, low self-esteem, depression, social 
anxiety, suicides. Young people kill and starve themselves and you don't 
think that this is a serious issue? People are angry at these types of ads 
because people DIE, and you call that immature? Maybe you need to grow up 
and realize that there are a lot of fucked up things in this world that 
completely makes sense to be sensitive about.

+Ichiro Taniguchi Ok. Hello. This is product that is making people feel 
judged and uncomfortable. It is ok to shave. It's ok not to too. In a world 
of mature adults we do not treat each other like children and tell each 
other what to do, that if anything is being childish.
sexist and racist.﻿
+Lara Croft the face that u name yourself Lara Croft makes YOU the moron

Racist? Oh, I forgot, believing that other races should be blacklisted from 
all jobs and media is the pinnacle of tolerance.
sexist and racist ! It's not funny at all!﻿

+Inés Franco Varela 
uh how is it racist? And sexist? That is a stretch.

I don't shave my legs, personally, but I can sort of see the humor in this. 
The problem is that it tries to define what femininity is. Females grow 
body hair, and you're just as feminine if you shave or if you're a fuzzy, 
if you want to be. And, on the other had, this commercial implies guys 
can't shave they're legs. Poopoo to you, guys can be manly as  hell and be 
smooth as they want to be. I stopped shaving about a year ago when I 
realized how much money and time I put into it. No one treats me different, 
and my fiance of 8 years still finds me sexy as can be. Millions of women 
all over don't shave and their partners, whatever their gender, still find 
them attractive. 
One more note, it's fine if you prefer you're women or men or whatever 
shaved, you get to choose what you like, it's how humans choose they're 
partners. But if you're saying things like "Ew, women/men who shave/don't 
shave are nasty" or "No one likes a hairy/smooth woman/man" or anything 
like that, and yes, it goes BOTH WAYS, YOU'RE PART OF THE PROBLEM. ﻿

+Helen Staten Statements Maybe I'm not offended because my leghair is not 
long enough to make me look like a modern cavemen.

EMBRACE THE 'DUDENESS' YOU OWN YOUR BODY! Always be confident no matter 
what you do :)﻿
你已經付錢了，我需要幫你做整隻腳﻿
lol... ﻿

Veet is not forcing women to do anything. They are just promoting, in a 
light-hearted manner, the idea that its more feminine for women to shave. 
Guess what- we have something in democracies called freedom of expression. 
If you prefer to not shave that's fine, its your body and your business but 
it doesn't give you a right to dictate they can't have their opinion.﻿
Si una persona mira mis piernas peludas con esa cara de asco, la pateo.﻿

Why are so many women so upset about shaving? Women shave, and this is 
normal in many societies. Get over it. Gender roles are decreasing in 
society, but speaking for the majority of males - hairy women just aren't 
sexy. Is it unfair that men don't have to shave? Sure. But men who do shave 
(areas besides their face)  are looked at strangely. Both genders have 
gender roles that restrict them or promote certain actions. Words like 
"sexism" and "racism" are thrown out here too liberally without any real 
meaning behind them. The closest this commercial got to racism was perhaps 
stereotyping, but if the majority of salons are run by Asians and the 
commercial reflects that, it is not exactly wrong, just a reflection of 
reality.

If you are a girl and don't want to shave, great. Don't. Every razor 
commercial you see will be "sexist" toward you. Also be aware at how 
unattractive that will make you seem to the opposite sex. If that doesn't 
bother you, fine - I could really care less.

As a man do you know what I find sexist? When all the girls are ogling over 
the shirtless guys in Twilight. Guys are "supposed" to have nice muscles, 
but I'm not going to get all bent out of shape the next time I see a 
commercial for a sports gym.﻿
Publicist are even more stupids everyday!!! where are they going to study??﻿

Oh, here we go another petty thing for feminazi's to complain about and 
call it sexists, racist or whatever. 

The advert was funny! 
Although women aren't known for their sense of humor are they. ﻿
I'm assuming you're all offended because your body hair grows 1+ cm a day.

+JamesBrenton9000 You don't think there are any funny women? Seriously not 
even one? Sounds like you need to get a sense of humour or a TV #justsaying. 
Also bad advert by the way because it's designed to make women feel bad 
about not shaving therefore it's not that funny. Much like if Lucozade 
started calling you a weedy feminine troll for not drinking their 
florescent orange sports drink every day and then said 'but it's funny come 
on get a sense of humour'.

it's so sexy when someone amalgamates the word feminist and nazi together, 
i love it! like, i want gender equality - but i also want to murder 10 
million people and 1 million children!!!!!!!!!!!!
why are you so angry? sounds like you need to get a sense of humor.

Oh my Gawd James... Do you hear yourself??? "And know that they themselves 
aren't that funny either" as if!!!!!!

Wow how freaking sexist can you be? I have no issue with dude wanting 
shaved girls, but not all females have to fall into your views.

Many, but they've all agreed that men are funnier and know that they 
themselves aren't that funny either.

JamesBrenton it's not this video that's irritating it's men like YOU!!! 
seriously have u ever had a girlfriend? Cause honey if u say that shit to 
her u ain't ever gonna

+JamesBrenton9000 Ah yes, no one you say. I'm sure my fiance of 8 years and 
the other millions of men/women/other gendered people who date/love/are

can see the humor, but these commercials are still insults. Femininity can 
come in al shape, sizes, and fuzzyness. Same goes for masculinity. If a 
dude wants to shave his legs, that's awesome too.

They're only angry because they know its true, no one wants a hairy women, 
thats disgusting.

Alot of things, just not humor, humor and women just don't go as proven by

Hahaaaaaaaa "Women aren't known for their sense of humour"! How very

This is beyond idiotic why must we as human beings place everything into a 
category: male, female, there is something wrong with forcing habits and 
the way someone chooses to live their life into gender roles especially 
traditional ones. It just causes unjust and unnecessary double standards 
and stunts expression and growth. ﻿
I think it's funny. No man likes a hairy woman, get over it.﻿
+omnidiscord Sorry?

+黄雪莉 oooOOH my gOD when u a YEAR late to a conversation tryna sound 
relevant!! ^^^ i'm doooone dude!

+omnidiscord Then how about this commercial is directed towards hairy woman 
who WANT to shave so that the "hairy protesters" don't foam at their mouth

should decide what she wants to do with her hair because it's what she

superficial that he only cares about whether or not a woman has hair on her

pretty dumb statement; it's not like lesbians don't wax their legs...

+omnidiscord
